ygData.subject: Bard specific quests?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... us ... I would disagree.  While I would love class specific quests (and weapons, armor, etc...) we have to realize that Verant has limited resources.  If
ygData.messageBody:
> Although the same thought has crossed my mind many times, I think having
us
> limited like this is part of Verant's balance plan.
> I would like to see some more bard-oriented quests for mid-high levels.
> Like the vengeful corpse quest in Halas - but more specifically bardic.

I would disagree. While I would love class specific quests (and weapons,
armor, etc...) we have to realize that Verant has limited resources. If
Verant had the time to add 50 new class specific quests, I could only do
four of them. I'd rather have access to more quests than fewer
class-specific quests.
